label: 法成寺
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [HW: A temple that was located in Kamigyō-ku, Kyoto,  built by Fujiwara no Michinaga in 1020.  Initially called Muryōju-in."] [藤原道長、無量寿院] [HW]"
